name: csv-column-extractor
title: CSV Column Extractor
description: Extract specific columns from CSV files by name or index
content:
Overview

This application extracts specific columns from CSV files. You can specify columns by their names or numeric indices.

Features

  • Extract columns by name (e.g., 'Name,Age,Email')
  • Extract columns by index (e.g., '0,2,4')
  • Uses Python csv module for robust parsing
  • Preserves header row and data integrity

Parameters

  • Input CSV File: Upload your CSV file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output
  • Columns: Comma-separated column names or indices (e.g., 'Name,Age' or '0,2')

Output

The application generates a new CSV file containing only the specified columns with suffix _extracted.csv
command: git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps_clone 2>/dev/null || (cd prod_apps_clone && git pull) && python prod_apps_clone/python/csv_column_extractor.py "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}" -c "${columns}"
